segments.text: This kitchen is a disgusting mess waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water spilling everywhere from that careless sink overflow.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle on the floor looks filthy already, soaking into everything.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's foot is in it, and she doesn't even care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Drying dishes while ignoring the floodâ€”unbelievable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are filthy thieves, pilfering cookies like rats.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Boy balanced on that rickety stool, hand deep in the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl begging for her share, all greedy and impatient.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Open cabinets spilling out temptation in this sloppy setup.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Even the pretty garden view can't hide the indoor grime.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel repulsed by the lack of awareness here.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What a revolting display of neglect and naughtiness.
segments.speaker: PAR
